tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE account_balances (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    balance DECIMAL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE savings_activity (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE account_balance_changes (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	account_id INT,
	change_amount DECIMAL,
	change_type VARCHAR(20),
	change_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE savings_activities (
	savings_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	account_id INT,
	savings_type VARCHAR(20),
	savings_amount DECIMAL,
	savings_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE unusual_activities (
	activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	account_id INT,
	activity_type VARCHAR(50),
	activity_description TEXT,
	activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE account_balance_changes (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    balance DECIMAL,
    change DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE savings_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT REFERENCES account_balance_changes(account_id),
    activity_type VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL,
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE unusual_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT REFERENCES account_balance_changes(account_id),
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT REFERENCES account_balance_changes(account_id),
    log_type VARCHAR,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE account_balance_changes (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    balance DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE unusual_activities (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID NOT NULL,
    activity_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);
